title: Manage Truck Queue during Peak Hours
description: During a busy period, the truck queue outside the gate is getting long. The gate manager must take action to speed up processing.

tasks.description: Monitor the gate camera feeds and queue length data.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager observes that the queue is extending into a public road, which is a safety concern.

tasks.description: Open additional gate lanes to increase throughput.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager opens two more available gate lanes.

tasks.description: Communicate with yard operations to ensure there are enough internal vehicles to service the faster gate flow.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager coordinates with the yard to ensure container handling equipment can keep up with the increased truck volume.
